termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions for Using Carevio

respect.title: 1. Principle of Mutual Respect
respect.body: Both parties — the client and the nurse — must maintain mutual respect during the provision or receipt of services. Any offensive language, insults, threats, or hostile behavior of any kind is strictly prohibited.

violation.title: 2. Actions in Case of Violation
violation.point1: Upon receiving the first documented complaint of abusive behavior, the offending party will receive an official warning.
violation.point2: Repeated violations or severe cases (physical threats, excessive verbal abuse, harassment) may result in account suspension or permanent ban from the platform.
violation.point3: All suspension or ban decisions are made by the support team after an internal investigation based on evidence (chat logs, recordings, witness statements, etc.).

complaint.title: 3. How to File a Complaint
complaint.body: The affected party may file a complaint via the 'Contact Us' form or by email at support@carevio.com.

appeal.title: 4. Right to Appeal
appeal.body: Any party receiving a warning or suspension has the right to appeal within 14 days from the date of notification. Appeals will be reviewed within a reasonable timeframe and the decision will be communicated in writing.

nurseConduct.title: 5. Nurse Conduct
nurseConduct.body: Nurses must adhere to professional ethics, respect privacy, and refrain from using any offensive language towards clients. Violations may result in supervisory actions or removal from the platform.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.body: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

law.title: 7. Governing Law
law.body: In matters not provided for herein, the applicable local laws shall apply. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the competent courts.
